da-desc: This is an example extension using the BoilerPlate.
da-transclusion-hash-ui-state-invalid: Invalid hash or verification data missing
da-transclusion-hash-ui-state-new-versio: New version of the resource available
da-transclusion-hash-ui-visit-latest: This section is not available on old revisions, visit '''latest revision''' to access it
da-specialdaconfig-desc: Configuration for the MediaWiki - Data Accounting Extension
da-specialdaconfig-softwareinfo:
Project GitHub: [$1 $1]
Data Accounting Version: $2
API Version: $3
Your Domain ID is: $4
da-specialdaconfig-signature-help: Content Signature adds a visible signature into the page content and write a new revision when signing a page with your wallet.
da-specialdaconfig-witnessconfiguration-: Configure Witness Network and Smart-Contract-Address for [[Special:WitnessPublisher| Domain Snapshot Publisher]]
Ensure you're generating a [[Special:Witness| Domain Snapshot]] before publishing.
da-export-field-latest-label: Include only latest revision of the page. If checked, only referenced revisions of included resources will be exported
da-import-fail-revision: Failed to import revision $2 of title [[$1]]
da-specialwitness-error-emptyhash: Error: [[$1]] has an empty verification hash. This indicates a manipulation, database corruption, or a bug. Recover or delete page.
da-specialwitness-snapshot-help: This page is a summary of all verified pages within your domain and is used to generate a merkle tree to witness and timestamp them simultanously. Use the [[Special:WitnessPublisher|Domain Snapshot Publisher]] to publish your generated Domain Snapshot to your preffered witness network.
da-specialwitness-error-emptyhash-descri: No verified page revisions available. Create a new page revision first.
da-specialwitness-showmerkleproof-text: Visit [[$1]] to see the Merkle proof.
da-specialwitnesspublisher-help-text: The Domain Snapshot Publisher shows you a list of all Domain Snapshots. You can publish a Domain Snapshot from here to the Ethereum Network to timestamp all page verification hashes and the related page revisions included in the Domain Snapshot. After publishing the Domain Snapshot, this will be written into the revision_verification data and included into the page history.
da-import-collision-move-reason: Resolving naming collision because imported page has longer verified chain height
da-import-collision-delete-reason: Deleted due to conflicting page import with a longer hash chain
da-import-collision-skip: Page [[:$1]] skipped. Page with the name already exists and has a longer or equal hash chain
da-import-collision-delete: Local version this page was deleted, since the imported version has a longer hash chain
da-import-collision-move: Original version of this page was moved to [[:$2]], since the imported version has a longer hash chain
da-revision-replacer-error-no-entity: No revision can be located based on provided verification hash
da-revision-replacer-error-title-mismatc: Requested verification hash resolves to a different title than what is requested
da-ui-delete-revisions-number: How many previous revisions to delete?
da-ui-delete-revisions-witness-warning: One of the revisions that would be deleted has already been witnessed
da-ui-squash-revisions-number: How many previous revisions to squash into one?
da-ui-squash-revisions-witness-warning: One of the revisions that would be squashed has already been witnessed
da-ui-squash-revisions-notice: Following revisions will be squashed into one:
da-ui-squash-revisions-no-revisions: At least two revisions are needed for squashing
da-ui-delete-revisions-no-revisions: Only one revision of this page available
da-specialinbox-direct-merge: Page "'''$1'''" does not exist on the wiki and can therefore be directly imported
da-specialinbox-merge-error-no-subject: Page selected for import is invalid
da-specialinbox-merge-error-target-exist: Attempted a direct import, but the target page already exists
da-specialinbox-merge-error-invalid targ: Cannot determine import target, or target title invalid
da-specialinbox-compare-local: Page "'''$1'''" already exists on the wiki. '''There are no remote changes to import.''' You can safely discard this draft.
da-specialinbox-compare-remote: Page "'''$1'''" already exists on the wiki. There are remote changes to import.
da-specialinbox-compare-both: Page "'''$1'''" already exists on the wiki. Local and remote versions of the page have diverged. Compare changes and select a merge strategy.
da-specialinbox-compare-none: Page "'''$1'''" already exists on the wiki. '''There are no changes to import.''' You can safely discard this draft.
